name: 5th International Conference on Teaching and Learning with Technology (iCTLT 2016)
content:
The conference is a strategic platform for Singapore to provide thought leadership and champion the effective use of technology for 21st century learning.

Local and international school leaders, teachers and industry experts will gather to learn and exchange innovative ideas about the opportunities and challenges in the use of established technology in 21st century teaching & learning. There will be Pre-Conference activities from 28th to 29th March, 2016.

More information on the conference and its registration can be found on http://www.ictlt.com. Please follow us at our Twitter page @ictlt2016
